response.summary:
Chemical Engineer with experience in food industry, specially flavors applications in savory, snacks, sauces and beverages applications and formulations, using different needed techniques to obtain each final product at a laboratory level. 

Experience in reducing sugar in carbonated beverages.

Handling of office package tools, team work skills, ability to assume challenges. Proficient English skills (C1 CEFR)
response.skills: Interpersonal Skills, Research and Development (R&D), Communication, Analytical Skills, Beverage Industry, Client Services, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Customer Service, Microsoft Word, Food Industry, Teamwork, English, Research, Problem Solving, Time Management, Food Technology, Project Management, Chemical Engineering

profile_positions.description:
Elaboration of various types of applications in Savory and Snacks, using different needed techniques to obtain each final product at a laboratory level.

Sensory analysis of final products obtained from applications.

Control of laboratory equipment.

Inventory of raw materials and packaging materials.

Verification and final disposal or expired raw materials, applications and market products.
profile_positions.title: Applications Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Control of laboratory equipment.

Inventory of raw materials and packaging materials.

Inventory of internal samples.

Elaboration of final products from previously developed formulas. 

Stability monitoring of final products.

Verification and final disposal of expired raw materials, applications and market products.
profile_positions.title: Practicum Student

school.name: Fundación Colegio Mayor de San Bartolomé

company.name: Alianza Team®
company.description: Somos una multilatina colombiana con más de 70 años en el sector de grasas y aceites vegetales que tiene el compromiso de alimentar un mejor mañana. Por medio de la innovación, hemos creado productos y modelos de negocio sostenibles con los cuales llevamos bienestar a clientes, consumidores, colaboradores y accionistas.  Nuestra presencia en Colombia, México y Chile nos permite atender la mayor parte del mercado latinoamericano y nos proyecta a expandirnos en todo el continente americano.
